pr:producer.pr:name: Château Bourgneuf
pr:producer.pr:description: Showing attractive red and dark fruits, cherry and plum, it is rich and even slightly racy, before concluding with classic Pomerol concentration and focus.

pr:producer.pr:name: Château Doisy-Daëne
pr:producer.pr:description: Medium bodied, with elegance rather than density there is a wide spectrum of flavours; apples, peaches, lemongrass and a touch of white spice. Delicious now.
